title: Ramaphosa elected SA president, vows anti-corruption fight
text:
Ramaphosa elected SA president, vows anti-corruption fight 4:53pm GMT - 01:41 
Cyril Ramaphosa was elected as South Africa’s president in a parliamentary vote on Thursday and pledged to tackle endemic corruption after scandal-ridden Jacob Zuma resigned on orders from the ruling African National Congress. Laura Frykberg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Cyril Ramaphosa was elected as South Africa’s president in a parliamentary vote on Thursday and pledged to tackle endemic corruption after scandal-ridden Jacob Zuma resigned on orders from the ruling African National Congress.
